text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The Intel Core R5 in the Eluktronics NB50TL Business Performance Barebone Build Your Own (BYO) Laptop Kit - 8th Gen Desktop Processor Ready, Includes 2GB GDDR5 NVIDIA MX150, 15.6” 45% NTSC Full HD IPS Display, Backlit Keys is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the Intel Core R5. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Eluktronics NB50TL Business Performance Barebone Build Your Own (BYO) Laptop Kit - 8th Gen Desktop Processor Ready, Includes 2GB GDDR5 NVIDIA MX150, 15.6” 45% NTSC Full HD IPS Display, Backlit Keys!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Valorant. A definite 5 stars!
